table.name: shipment_cost_detail
table.description: The shipment_cost_detail table contains an explanation of how each shipment cost was calculated.  The explanation is stored in the DETAIL column.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_COST_SEQNO
columns.description: The foreign key to shipment cost table.

columns.name: DETAIL_SEQNO
columns.description: A one-up number to make the cost detail record unique.

columns.name: DETAIL
columns.description: The textual description of the cost detail as calculated and applied by the rating engine.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
